Reference

All functions

diagnose_detection()

Evaluate the performance of a signal detection procedure

energy_detector()

Detects the start and end of acoustic signals

feature_reference()

Extract quantitative features of references

filter_detection()

Remove ambiguous detections

get_envelopes()

Extract absolute amplitude envelopes

get_templates()

Find templates more similar to other signals in a reference table

label_detection()

Evaluate the performance of a signal detection procedure

label_spectro()

Plot a labeled spectrogram

lbh1

Long-billed hermit recording

lbh2

Long-billed hermit recording

lbh_reference

Example data frame of a selection table including all signals of interests.

merge_overlaps()

Merge overlapping selections

ohun

ohun: Optimizing acoustic signal detection

Optimize energy-based signal detection

optimize_template_detector()

Optimize acoustic template detection

split_acoustic_data()

Splits sound files

summarize_diagnostic()

Summarize detection diagnostics

template_correlator()

Acoustic templates correlator using time-frequency cross-correlation

template_detector()

Acoustic template detection from time-frequency cross-correlations
